Desc.eng: My dear fellow, you scared me! Now I lost count of... Hmm, I don't remember what I was counting exactly.

I'm the Senior Klockmeister. Some gears require adjusting, otherwise one of the other clock towers will go out of alignment. Because of the Relic, see? It could lead to another catastrophical anomaly.
So you actually know how this thing works. Unlike me.
Indeed. I tried to count the exact number of cogs on this wheel, but I'm too exhausted. If you help me out, I'll show you a neat trick. Interested?
Alright, I'll count the cogs on the wheel for you.
Learning tricks from a deranged clocksmith? No, thank you.
